entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have decided to answer R2's call.  Neutralize the Renegade threat!
entries.journal_entry_description: R2-D2 is in dire need of help.  There are a group of renegades forming in the Tatooine System around the Space Station.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Renegades are gathering in the Tatooine System near the main Space Station.  Help!!
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: R2-D2 is in dire need of your help.  There are groups of renegades forming in the Tatooine System around the main Space Station.
